ygData.subject: HighPass Keep Goblin Ears (Was RE RE RE Sol RO Temp Quest)
ygData.msgSnippet: John, Left Goblin Ears in Highpass Keep, when turned into Captain Bosec with give you faction with the Corrupt Guards of Qeynos AND the Freeport Militia and a
ygData.messageBody:
John,

Left Goblin Ears in Highpass Keep, when turned into Captain Bosec
with give you faction with the Corrupt Guards of Qeynos AND the
Freeport Militia and a few others. You do NOT take a hit with
the good Freeport guards or the good Qeynos guards.

I belive Orc scalps turned into the Volunteer (sp?) in Highpass
itself will do the same.

Since I spent from level 22-32 in HighPass Keep, I had over 200
ears saved up. I gave them all to a Paladin who was KOS, and
it got her to dubious. (from scowls I beleive)

Frashii (Vanitii?), 32nd strung bard
Seekers of Lore OFficer, Tarew Marr, http://www.loreseekers.com

PS. I am offering 50pp for each RIGHT goblin ear, please contact
me =)

PPS. As for the why you'd want to kill him..
When you are young, and starting out, the 50-100pp you
got for selling the Bloodforge Hammer was a SUBSTATIONAL
amount of money. (Think back to your first level 10 or so
character and how broke you were!)


> I don't know why you'd want to kill him. The weapon you get
> is not really that good, and the faction hit is substantial.
> Repairing your faction with the merchants of Qeynos is easy
> enough (visit Blackburrow). But everything I've found that
> raises your faction with the Corrupt Guards of Qeynos also
> lowers it with the non-corrupt guards.
>
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
